name: Red Cube's new adventure
description:
A new game of Red Cube, a new adventure.

The lider of the mafia, a pedophile, kidnaped your son.

Jump in platforms, go into caves and raid the house of the mafia for save your son.

---Controls---

Jump: "Space"

Stop: "Left Arrow"

The game is on speedrun.com:

https://www.speedrun.com/red_cubes_new_adventure
